name: Garbage keeper
description:
Made during the Game Dev Party #15, in November 2019 in Lyon, in 3 Days. See more about the Game Dev Party at http://gamedevparty.fr/ .

The theme for this edition was "Zero waste", which led us to this tower defense where you must project the area by killing trash ennemies and recycle their component to create better ammo

Team :

Art :   Grégory

Sound:   Manda Razakamanantsoa

Dev:
  Florent Boissy
  Youri Gicquel
  Lilian Cartellier

Controls: 

Left click on a block to build a turret on it. Right click to recycle the turret. Drag and drop ingredients on bottom left to craft new munition types. Drag and drop munition types on turrets to equip turrets with new munition.

Munition types  (left to right, top to bottom):
- Poisoning : damage over time
- Goo : slows down ennemies
- Wool ball : only way to shoot flying ennemies
- Batteries : can be shot further away
- Explosive : damages nearby ennemies
